> Is there a way of creating report with JUnit which displays how many
> tests passed
> and how many failed(with possibly more details). The GUI is not
> sufficient for reporting tests (which may be over 5000 running over
> hours).

Several solutions:

1) easy: use the JUnitReport task from Ant

2) a little more effort: use JUnit-addons Runner (external package), write your
own listener, register it and run the tests

3) complicated: write a TestResultListener, create a new JUnit TestRunner
(inheritance), register the listener when the TestResult is created and run the
tests

I would jump on 1)

Good luck

-Vladimir
